sentences.en: A canine dog those have be trained to attack burglars, etc.

sentences.en: A person bitten by a dog as a child, for instance, might be able to overcome a canine phobia if the old memory can be replaced with a less scary one.
sentences.cn: 比如，一个人在小时候被狗咬过，假使能将他这段记忆换成相对不那么可怕的事情，也许就可以帮助他克服犬恐惧症。

sentences.cn: 目的分离和鉴定犬副流感病毒.

sentences.en: Check with your vet about canine hygiene and worming.
sentences.cn: 检查你有无狂犬病和弓形虫病的记录.

sentences.en: He watched the canine warfare with the deepest interest.
sentences.cn: 他极有兴趣地观看斗狗.

sentences.en: Her lips parted to show her canine teeth.
sentences.cn: 她撇开嘴,露出两个虎牙来.

sentences.en: Police eventually managed to give the injured canine help.

sentences.en: Sam Dawson has everything for your canine needs.

sentences.en: She's a specialist in canine psychology and behaviour.

sentences.en: Teeth should be evenly placed and the lower jaw canine tusks.

sentences.en: The fox is a canine animal.

sentences.en: This lack of time socializing with his siblings means that puppy will not develop important canine skills.

sentences.en: TYPICAL USE : The carnivorous animals are characterized especially by large, sharp canine teeth.
sentences.cn: 肉食动物的特征是大而尖的犬齿.

sentences.en: Veterinarians believe a rise in canine diabetes, along with a surge in feline diabetes, are due to obesity.
sentences.cn: 兽医们相信犬糖尿病发病率的上升，以及猫糖尿病发病率的激增都是由于肥胖所致。

sentences.en: Your dog is a canine version of a brain surgeon.
sentences.cn: 因为你的狗狗聪明绝顶.
